text: Son of Oklahoma is a 1932 western film directed by Robert N. Bradbury and starring his son Bob Steele.The AFI Catalog of Feature Films:Son of Oklahoma ==Cast== *Bob Steele - Dan Clayton *Josie Sedgwick - Mary Clayton, aka Shotgun Mary *Carmen Laroux - Anita Verdugo *Julian Rivero - Don Manuel Verdugo *Robert Homans - John Clayton, aka Silent Jack Clay *Henry Roquemore - Salesman Stage Passenger *Earl Dwire - Ray Brent ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1932 films Category:Films directed by Robert N. Bradbury Category:American films Category:American Western (genre) films Category:1932 Western (genre) films Category:American black-and-white films
title: Son of Oklahoma
